actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to the date for compliance by certain point sources with effluent limitation.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to grant a one-year extension from best practicable technology effluent limitations for point sources receiving research grants for the development of new technologies where such research project was unsuccessful.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to the date for compliance by certain point sources with effluent limitation.
